lead_paragraph: In today's mobile, real-time world, fast food is not fast enough.
snippet: Kudzu Interactive, owner of Snapfinger, a Web and mobile app for ordering takeout from chain restaurants will announce Monday that it raised $7 million from Norwest Venture Partners and early investors.

headline.main: On the Go and Hungry? Try an 'Appy' Meal

abstract: Kudzu Interactive, owner of Snapfinger, a Web and mobile app for ordering takeout from chain restaurants will announce Monday that it raised $7 million from Norwest Venture Partners and early investors.
